name: Pong64
description:
Hi! My name is Carlos Pascual, also known as 'Azafran'.

This is the first game I've ever made. I used Game Maker, and GML programming language. I thought the low rez jam it's a very good occasion to start learning about game development.

I also want to help people like me, who would like to learn how to make games, so I'm to sharing the GameMaker project with all, and making the source code available.

Thanks!

www.azafranart.com

Credits:

  • All sprites and code are made from scratch by me.
  • Sounds made with the tool 'sfxr'.
  • Title music "Strut" by chasersgaming. I edited it to make a loop and cut the part that doesn't interest me. It has a public domain license.

* The .zip file includes the GM project with all the code!
